message.content:
cs.GT, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.DS 

The paper discusses the strategic behavior of content providers in recommendation systems, which falls under the category of game theory (cs.GT). It also involves modeling users and contents in a semantic space, which is related to information retrieval (cs.IR). The paper proposes a mediator to improve social welfare, which is a topic in machine learning and optimization (cs.LG). The use of facility location games is also a key aspect of the paper, which falls under the category of social and information networks (cs.SI) and algorithms and data structures (cs.DS).
